casebody.data:
Gerold Moving and Warehouse Company, Appellee, v. Potomac Insurance Company of District of Columbia, Appellant.

(Abstract of Decision.)

Heard in this court at October term, 1939;opinion filed March 9, 1940.Kramer, Campbell, Costello & Wiechert, for appellant; Wheeler, Oehmke & Dunham, for appellee. Opinion by Presiding Justice Stone.

“Not to be published in full.”
